description: No tab anywhere I've seen has got this song tabbed correctly, notes in wrong spots that weren't even played, wrong fills, etc. The stems are available online so I did this transcription directly from the isolated bass track, it is 99% accurate to how it was originally played.
title: Uptown Funk

description:
at the end of the bar in the main riff BASS GUITAR there cannot be C# note (fret 4) MUST BE C (fret 3)
I corrected all the bars!
title: Uptown Funk
